---
title: Transverse Acetabular Ligament
---


Spans the 60-70&deg; gap of the *acetabular notch* to form a complete circle with the rest of the *acetabulum* @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.


The *transverse acetabular lig.* serves as an attachment site of the [ligamentum teres]({{< var ref-ligamentum-teres.path >}}) @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017.
